scripts.build: npm run build:client && npm run build:server
scripts.build:server: cd server && dotnet build --configuration Release --no-restore --verbosity quiet -p:TreatWarningsAsErrors=true
scripts.test: npm run test:client && npm run test:server
scripts.precommit: npm run build && npm run lint:md
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd client && npm install && cd ../server && dotnet restore
